event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined perspective poller event: A perspective poller detected a node lost service
event.descr: A %service% outage was identified on interface %interface% from location: %parm[perspective]%.
event.logmsg: %service% outage identified on interface %interface% from location %parm[perspective]% with reason code: %parm[eventReason]%.

event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined perspective poller event: A perspective poller detected a node regained service
event.descr:
The %service% service on interface %interface% was previously down from %parm[perspective]%.

This event is generated when a service which had previously failed polling attempts is again responding to polls by OpenNMS.
event.logmsg: %service% outage identified on interface %interface% from location %parm[perspective]% has cleared.
